title: Living Room
description: You are in the living room.

east.failureMessage: The chimney is too narrow for you and all of your baggage.

west.failureMessage: The north wall is solid rock.

atmosphere: The air is cool and damp.
Water drips somewhere in the darkness.
Your footsteps echo off the stone walls.
firstVisitDescription: You are in the living room. There is a doorway to the east, a wooden door with strange gothic lettering to the west, which appears to be nailed shut, a trophy case, and a large oriental rug in the center of the room.
